Package index

Loading data

Functions for loading climate data from different sources.

loadUerra()
Load UERRA data into climate4R grid format
loadCMIP5()
Load CMIP5 data into climate4R grid format
loadTrace() loadHistoricalTraceGrid() loadTraceGrid()
Load TraCE21ka data

Downscaling data

Functions for downscaling climate data.

downscaleCMIP5()
Downscale CMIP5 grid data
downscaleTrace()
Downscale TraCE21ka data

Other functions

Several functions for modifying climate data object and or helpers to other functions.

computeWindSpeed()
Compute wind speed from their horizontal (u) and vertical (v) components.
getVerticalLevelPars()
Definition of vertical dimension slices
grid2spatialdf()
Convert climate4R grid object as spatial data frame.
modifyDates()
Modify dates in a climate4R object
traceFileNames()
Return names (including path) of TraCE21ka data files
